text: A Man's Shadow is a 1920 British silent crime film directed by Sidney Morgan and starring Langhorn Burton, Violet Graham and Gladys Mason. In the film, a man murders a Jewish moneylender, but his doppelganger is accused of the crime. ==Cast== * Langhorn Burton as Peter Beresford / Julian Grey * Violet Graham as Vivian Beresford * Gladys Mason as Yolande Hampton * Arthur Lennard as Robert Hampden * J. Denton-Thompson as Williams * Sidney Paxton as Billings * Babs Ronald as Helen Beresford * Warris Linden as Simon Oppenheim ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. The History of the British Film 1918-1929.
